body:
Hi Andy,


Thanks for that. It's interesting that you set -lw to 1/ad^ab, not just
1/ad. Will try this out. I also feel that the number of sky divisions
should have an impact on -ad (especially for sunny skies), but I can't
quite put my finger on it.

Cheers

Axel
subject: [Radiance-general] Re: rtcontrib -c
